attributes.action: Actually Improve the NHS instead of wrecking it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS is a great institution, made up of thousands of wonderful, talented and dedicated caring people who do a great job. But it is also in a dire state because of massive unecessary cutbacks. Why is it there are supposed 'shortages' of doctors, nurses etc yet newly-qualified staff are having to move abroad or take jobs they did not spend 3 years training for (stacking shelves for example). It is a travesty that talent is being wasted like this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
